local_intent: Perceive plate and pot, align to pot, place pot onto plate with yaw 0 and press_force 10, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Manipulator has control of the pot for placement
Plate and pot remain within view during alignment
coherence_with_global: Implements the PlaceOnSurface step within the global sequence by detecting targets, aligning, executing the placement with specified parameters, and verifying post-action visibility.
